graphiti-memory.description: Graphiti MCP Server for Auto-Claude persistent memory with FalkorDB knowledge graph

_notes.transport_info: The zepai/graphiti-falkordb image uses SSE (Server-Sent Events) transport. Health endpoint reports 'websocket' service type.

_instructions.integration: To integrate with Auto-Claude, merge the mcpServers configuration into your .mcp.json file or Claude settings
prerequisites: Start memory stack: docker compose -f infrastructure/compose/memory.yml up -d
Wait for Graphiti MCP Server health: http://localhost:8000/health
available_methods: add_episode - Write memory entries to the knowledge graph
search - Semantic search of memories using embeddings
get_entity - Retrieve specific entities by ID
